- slack-desc template
- meson template

- For http error
- maintainer config file
- doinst.sh template
- python template
- autotools template
- cmake template
- perl template
- rubygem template
- haskell template
- meson template
Added:
- Slackbuild repository version in the config file
- douninst.sh script

- Improved code quality

Added:
- Options to the cli menu

Fixed:
- IndexError: list index out of range #1
